```{r}

library(readxl)
library(forecast)

file_path <- "C:\\Users\\Srishti\\Desktop\\FALL24\\BF\\Assignment3\\Data_NewYork.xlsx"
dataFile <- read_excel(file_path)

timeSeriesData <- ts(dataFile$UnemployedLF, start=c(1976, 1), frequency=12)  
plot(timeSeriesData)
acf(timeSeriesData)

# Decomposition
decomposed_data <- decompose(timeSeriesData)
str(dataFile$UnemployedLF)
plot(decomposed_data)

# Using stl
stl_decomposition <- stl(timeSeriesData, s.window = "periodic")
plot(stl_decomposition)

#seasonal adjustments
plot(timeSeriesData)
lines(seasadj(stl_decomposition), col="Red")

#Default period forecast
f_stl <- forecast(stl_decomposition) 
plot(f_stl)
```
